DUnitX.AutoDetect.Console Namespace

Summary

Using this unit will auto detect the platform you are compiling for and register the correct console unit.

Remarks

It is really just adding the correct unit DUnitX."PlatformName".Console Unit to the project via a compiler define.

This cleans up the DPR uses by removing the need for {$IFDEF} statements in the project uses clause. If a {$IFDEF} is in the project uses clause and you add a new file Delphi does not know which area to put it in and has to guess.

In versions prior to XE3 it would just remove {$IFDEF} statements completely from your code. http://qc.embarcadero.com/wc/qcmain.aspx?d=6294'

See Also
